source: Tip: Frenzy causes you to reload frequently, and Assault's fast reloads mitigate this.
Tip: Marksman throws an extra grenade, and Shrapnel makes them deal extra damage.
Tip: Heavy restores shield up to max health. Beefcake gives more max health, which indirectly gives more max shield too.
Tip: Use Assault's move speed to get close to enemies and hit them with the explosion from Automatic Armor's syringe mutation.
Tip: Bounced bullets can travel further, and Marksman's bullets deal extra damage at range.
Tip: Fire Storm gains damage the further it travels, as do Marksman's bullets. Grab a sniper and fight at range.
Tip: Heavy's extra shield makes fights last longer, giving Revenge Rocket more time to unload all its rockets.
Tip: Hypnotic Army lets you bring civs into a fight with you. When they die Assault's perk makes them drop free health kits.
Tip: Spam Venom Shot with Caster's faster cooldowns, and get the mutation for double healing after every cast.
Tip: Heavy gives extra rate of fire based on your level, and Illicit Income's econ boost let you reach higher levels.
Tip: Scavenger needs to stand still to restore shifts and passive regen faster. Use Smoke Bomb to hide yourself when stationary. Smoke Bomb's mutation also gives you extra loot to duplicate.
Tip: Spam active skills with Caster's faster cooldowns and throw a free Molotov for every cast.
Tip: Get damage dealing active skills. Make them deal more damage with Skill Shots, and spam them faster as Caster.
Tip: Criminal gets cop waves more often and can climb wanted levels faster. Illicit Income gives extra farm at higher wanted levels.
Tip: Get the mutation for X-Ray Vision to reveal rare loot drops on the minimap, so you can duplicate higher quality loot faster.
Tip: Use the bonus jump height from the Boots of Travel mutation to jump onto boxes and place chemicals in areas enemies are unlikely to step on (so they don't get discovered).
Tip: Get the Executioner mutation to make enemies and civs explode. Then kill your gang near an enemy to cause a chain reaction that explodes all around your enemy.
Tip: Scavenger drops a bunch of loot once you collect enough of it, and the healing from Medical Supplies makes you nearly invulnerable when it's dropping.
Tip: Killer Cooldowns speeds up your chemical cooldowns, allowing Scientist to place chemicals faster for a larger income.
Tip: Get a Photon Beam with explosive bullets, stand next to a wall and fire. You'll blast way up into the air, allowing you to land next to unsuspecting enemies with Soul Drop.
Tip: Criminal's gets cop waves faster, which brings more cop cars around you. Manic Mechanic gives more farm for these cars as well as more deadly car explosions.
Tip: Get the Assassinate mutation for extra damage against your target, perfect for quick burst kills during Assassin's kill window.
Tip: Use Force Fields to survive and preserve your upgrade power. Also get the mutation to initiate fights with big burst damage during the kill window.
Tip: Assassin's vendor upgrades are more powerful, so get as many as you can by killing vendors with the Armed Robbery mutation.

Tip: When Assault kills civs or cops they drop a health kit that gives bonus damage to your next shot. Poison Trail lets you kill civs without firing your gun, allowing you to stack up multiple damage charges.
Tip: Marksman class has no healing, so Self Repair helps stay alive. Self Repair's mutation gives huge move speed to pull back in fights and ensure you're fighting at long range.
Tip: Heavy gets increased rate of fire causing you to reload often. Falling Inferno throws a free molotov whenever you empty your clip.
Tip: Charged Shot buffs your next bullet after every skill cast. Spam actives as Caster and fire a shot between casts for extra damage.
Tip: Get the Blade Mail mutation to make your med kits deal extra damage, then kill civs as Assault for free med kits.
Tip: Laser Scope's mutation gives extra bullet range, and Marksman's bullets deal extra damage at range.
Tip: Mana Shield protects you whenever you cast a skill, and Caster lets you cast skills more often.
Tip: Scavenger restores shift charges faster, allowing you to dish out more damage with Shift Attack.
Tip: Hypnotic Army lets you restore the health of your gang when playing as Criminal.
Tip: Skill Shots buffs all non-bullet damage, including the explosion effect from Scientist's bombs.

Tip: Use the double damage from Critical Rage to get kills during Assassin's kill window. Also use it to take out gangster camps fast, earn more cash, and buy more vendor upgrades (which are stronger on Assassin).
Tip: Kill vendors with Armed Robbery to drop quality loot, then duplicate it as Scavenger.
Tip: Kill your Criminal gang to get easy multi-kills and drop extra loot from Combo Killer. Get the mutation for infinite shifting, and kill one civ at a time to extend the free shifting duration.
Tip: Use Invisibility to move faster to complete missions sooner, giving free vendor upgrades. Get the mutation and stalk enemies with Invis to deal huge burst damage during Assassin's kill window.
Tip: Get the mutation for Blade Fury to extend its slashing size, then use Assault's faster move speed to close the gap on enemies.
Tip: Marksman throws double grenades, and Gunslinger's mutation lets you carry extra grenades and throw them faster.
Tip: Heavy gains extra rate of fire based on your level, and Armed Robbery's econ boost let you reach higher levels.
Tip: Caster can buy vendor upgrades cheaper, but don't buy any until you unlock Beefcake's mutation. Then buy extra vendor upgrades to get more max health.
Tip: Cast Bullet Time and start firing bullets as you move forward. Then toggle it off to unleash them all at once at an unsuspecting enemy. Marksman's extra bullet range ensures the blast hits.
Tip: Get Mana Shield's mutation to increase your max shield, then stand in XP Pools to top it up when playing Heavy.
Tip: Killer Cooldowns speeds up your skill cooldowns, allowing you to spam Caster's active skills even faster.
Tip: Use Invisibility to loot the map faster and avoid dying (which causes Scavenger to lose half of its collected loot).
Tip: Get the mutation for Proximty Rounds to charge bullets faster whenever a gangster is nearby, which you'll often have as a part of Criminal's gang.

Tip: Use Teleportation to quickly get into fights where other players are fighting, so you can place a chemical in time to collect cash and bombs from their deaths. Also teleport onto roofs to place hidden chemicals.
Tip: Camp a corner as Assassin until your kill window begins, then use the burst damage from Blade Fury to secure the kill quickly.
Tip: The extra loot dropped from Combo Killer helps Scavenger duplicate more often. Also get the mutation for infinite shifting to loot the map faster.
Tip: Energy Vortex heals you for every enemy within it. This includes Criminal's gang, allowing you to sacrfice your gang for huge healing.
Tip: Both Clip Magnet and Scentist's bombs will boost your secondary weapon. Use Scientist's extra cash income to buy a good secondary weapon and swap between them whenever you run out of ammo.
Tip: Use Soul Drop's mutation to jump way up in the air, then cast Firestorm at the top so your fireballs can travel further for extra damage.
Tip: Every grenade thrown by Cluster Bomb will give bonus damage to your next bullet with Charged Shot. Just make sure to fire after every grenade to get the full benefit.
Tip: Capture an army of civilians with Hypnotic Army, then use the Executioner mutation to blow them all up in a chain reaction when enemies are nearby.
Tip: Cast Self Repair first, then immediately cast Mirror Image after. Your clone will also have Self Repair active for double healing.
Tip: Shift Supply gives you more shift charges, allowing you to deal more damage with Shift Attack.
Tip: Casting Frenzy will trigger Mana Shield to protect you, so you can rush down enemies with more damage and armor.
Tip: Get the mutation of Poison Trail to spawn free double damage drops, and get the mutation of Critical Rage to make them last much longer.
Tip: Get the mutation for Laser Scope to extend your bullet range, allowing your Bouncing Bullets to ricochet around the map for longer.
Tip: Use Manic Mechanic to farm huge amounts of cash, and then spend it all on vendor upgrades to take full advantage of Beef Cake's mutation.
Tip: Shrapnel boosts the damage of your Revenge Rockets. Get the Shrapnel mutation early to start farming extra cash.
Tip: Use X-Ray Vision to see enemies behind walls, then nuke their location with Radiate.
Tip: Get the mutation for Stimpacks to drop free med kits, and get the mutation for Blade Mail to make them deal extra damage.
Tip: The DPS of Blade Fury's slashing gives insane healing with Vampirism's mutation.
Tip: Skill Shots makes your Venom Shot do more damage. And Venom Shot kills gives you more Skill Shots charges.
Tip: Use the Boots of Travel mutation to jump onto boxes and jump off them again to trigger Soul Drop more easily.
Tip: Phase Drifting does extra damage at max speed, but at such speeds is hard to aim. Use Clip Magnet's seeking to help with this.
Tip: Bullet Time slows both your own and enemy bullets. But active skills like Spike Trap aren't slowed, allowing you to attack enemies who can't attack you.

Tip: Spam Shockwave everywhere. Mutated Shockwave lets you instantly kill cops and civilians, even through walls. This triggers Killer Cooldowns to speed up your Shockwave cooldown, and if mutated will heal you as well.
Tip: Gunslinger's mutation gives you extra grenade carry slots, and Shrapnel makes them deal more damage.
Tip: Combo Killer causes civs and cops to drop extra loot, which heals you with Medical Supplies.
Tip: Smoke Bomb's mutation drops free damage kits, which deal extra damage with Blade Mail's mutation.

Tip: Cast Force Field to charge at enemies and get close enough to trap them in your Energy Vortex. Both skills also share many similar vendor upgrade tags, so buying those will buff both skills at the same time.
Tip: Skill Shots increases your knife damage with Flying Dagger. Knife kills give you more Skill Shots charges.
Tip: Both Clip Magnet and Proximity Rounds buff your secondary weapon, making it worthwhile to buy a good secondary and switch when you run out of ammo.
Tip: Use the move speed and sneakiness of Invisiblity to get close to enemies, then cast Blade Fury to initiate on them with huge slashing damage.
Tip: Get the mutation for Fire Storm to drop a wall of molotov fire, and get the mutation for Falling Inferno to increase its duration.
Tip: Get the Medical Supplies mutation to spawn bomb boxes where your grenades explode, then cast Cluster Bomb and cover the map with explosive crates.

Tip: Get both mutations, wait for your Automatic Armor cooldown to reset, then Teleport onto an unsuspecting victim. The Teleport will deal big burst damage, and as soon as they shoot you your Automatic Armor will explode as well.
